Commentary.Commentary: First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt missed. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Tammy Abraham with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kyle Naughton.
Federico FernÃ¡ndez (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace).
Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Attempt missed. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luka Milivojevic with a cross.
Attempt missed. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luka Milivojevic.

Attempt missed. Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Wayne Hennessey.
Attempt missed. Alfie Mawson (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Tom Carroll with a cross following a corner.
Offside, Swansea City. Kyle Naughton tries a through ball, but Tammy Abraham is caught offside.
Attempt missed. James Tomkins (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Joel Ward.
Delay in match James Tomkins (Crystal Palace) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Martin Kelly replaces James Tomkins because of an injury.
Offside, Swansea City. Tom Carroll tries a through ball, but Tammy Abraham is caught offside.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 1. Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Leroy Fer with a cross.
First Half ends, Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 1.
Second Half begins Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 1.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Lee Chung-yong replaces Patrick van Aanholt.
Corner,  Crystal Palace. Conceded by Federico FernÃ¡ndez.
Attempt saved. Martin Kelly (Crystal Palace) header from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jason Puncheon with a cross.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 2. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kyle Naughton.
